comment: So Jordan Peterson weighed in on Kavanaugh. Peterson says Kavanaugh should resign if confirmed. I wholeheartedly disagree. Wow - so Peterson thinks unsubstantiated baseless charges should be able to destroy a man's life without any corroboration? Just wow.
amr:
# ::snt So Jordan Peterson weighed in on Kavanaugh. Peterson says Kavanaugh should resign if confirmed. I wholeheartedly disagree. Wow - so Peterson thinks unsubstantiated baseless charges should be able to destroy a man's life without any corroboration? Just wow.

      :snt1 (w / weigh-in-02
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Jordan"
                        :op2 "Peterson"))
            :ARG1 (p2 / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Kavanaugh")))
      :snt2 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 (p3 / person
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Peterson"))
            :ARG1 (r / recommend-01
                  :ARG1 (r2 / resign-01
                        :ARG0 p2)
                  :condition (c / confirm-01
                        :ARG1 p2)))
      :snt3 (d / disagree-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :degree (w2 / wholehearted))
      :snt4 (w3 / wow
            :mode expressive)
      :snt5 (t / think-01
            :ARG0 (p4 / person
                  :name (n4 / name
                        :op1 "Peterson"))
            :ARG1 (r3 / recommend-01
                  :ARG1 (c2 / capable-01
                        :ARG1 (c3 / charge-05
                              :ARG1-of (s2 / substantiate-01
                                    :polarity -)
                              :ARG1-of (b / base-02
                                    :polarity -))
                        :ARG2 (d2 / destroy-01
                              :ARG0 c3
                              :ARG1 (l / life
                                    :poss (m2 / man))
                              :manner (c4 / corroborate-01
                                    :polarity -))))
            :polarity (a / amr-unknown)
            :mod w3
            :mod (j / just)))
